name: Shizue: Innocent curse
detailed_description:
Story

"It seems that there is a safe in my grandmother's house.My grandmother cares about its contents. "

When I was doing something like a kind detective, I was asked by my mother to check out the house of a seriously ill grandmother.

I will go to my grandmother's house reluctantly, and try to solve my grandmother's "worries".

Solve the many mysteries that occur in eerie houses and see the truth.And the true character of the mysterious girl.

Overview

Your purpose is to visit an old Japanese residence, to solve various mysteries while experiencing various paranormal phenomena, and to escape safely. The mansion has the first floor, the second floor and the basement.As you unravel the mystery, you will see the truth.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 8GB or better
